channel.title: Mondo Movie
channel.description: Cult movies, horror, exploitation, world cinema and other genre treats on DVD, Blu-ray and in cinemas. Ben Howard and Dan Auty cast their square eyes over some of the strangest, coolest and scariest movies from around the world

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #110 - Hey ho! Trejo!
item.description: This week we take a look at Robert Rodriguez's Tex-Mex exploitation actionfest Machete, and tackle Sion Sono's bizarre horror satire The Suicide Club

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #109 - Dead Airtime
item.description: The first three episodes of TV zombie thriller The Walking Dead come under discussion this week, as does Pier Paolo Pasolini's notorious 1975 arthouse shocker Salo, Or The 120 Days Of Sodom. Plus your mail and question of the week!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #108 - Frightfest 2010 Part 2
item.description: The second part of our Frightfest 2010 overview takes in The Dead, the documentary Video Nasties, Red White And Blue, Buried, The Last Exorcism and more...

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #107 - Frightfest 2010 Part 1
item.description: Once again we take a look at all the movies we saw at this year's Frightfest, including Hatchet 2, Monsters, Cherry Tree Lane, Red Hill and much much more

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #106 - Le Postbag Grande
item.description: We tackle a bumper bag of listener mail, and take a look at Jean-Pierre Melville's classic '70s cops'n'robbers thriller Le Cercle Rouge. Plus a special guest appearance from Tom Waits!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #105 - The Norse Whisperer
item.description: We return with a hacking-and-slaying double bill featuring Nicolas Winding Refn's viking art film Valhalla Rising and the old-school fantasy romp Solomon Kane.

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #104 - Prophet And Loss
item.description: This week we take a look at highly acclaimed French prison thriller A Prophet, and delve into Roman Polanski's back catalogue with his creepy '70s psychodrama The Tenant.

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #103 - The REC-ing Crew
item.description: There's more high-rise zombie mayhem in the Spanish horror sequel [Rec] 2, and we take on Fred Williamson and Robert Forster in this week's homework, William Lustig's 1983 exploitation actioner Vigilante. Plus the winners of our House Of The Devil competition!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #102 - The Up-Skirt Locker
item.description: This week we take in Sion Sono's dazzling four-hour mix of teen romance, religious fervour and pantie-peeking pornography Love Exposure, plus Christopher Nolan's low-budget first feature Following

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #101 - The Long Arm Of The Law
item.description: Flesh-rotting body horror meets high school strangeness in the much-delayed Cabin Fever 2: Spring Fever, and we kick off our new homework section with the 1972 Japanese sexploitation cop drama Hanzo The Razor: Sword Of Justice

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #100 - Best Films Of The Decade!
item.description: To celebrate our 100th show we take a bumper-length look back over ten years of cinematic goodness and pick our favourite movies from 2000-2009. Here's to the next 100!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #99 - Review Of 2009
item.description: We wave farewell to 2009 with our annual countdown of our favourite movies of the past 12 months - plus the stinkers! Happy new year everyone!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #98 - Bump In The Night
item.description: This week we take a look at the low-budget horror phenomenon Paranormal Activity and the little-seen Rocky Horror follow-up Shock Treatment. Plus we find out your most hated movies of 2009!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #97 - Just say Noe!
item.description: Controversial French director Gaspar Noe returns with the trippy epic Enter The Void, and Werner Herzog and Nicolas Cage bring us the bonkers Bad Lieutenant - Port Of Call New Orleans

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #96 - Love Like Blood
item.description: It's our Halloween show, and we take a look at Chan-wook Park's vampire tale Thirst as well as welcoming Fred Dekker's cult favourite Night Of The Creeps onto DVD and Blu-ray. Plus question of the week, listener mail, a competition and news of our 100th show!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #95 - Frightfest 2009 part two
item.description: On the second part of our Frightfest 2009 overview, we take in bizarre shocker The Human Centipede, Philip Ridley's horror fantasy Heartless, acclaimed anthology Trick 'r Treat, Dario Argento's Giallo and much more. Plus a chance to win some very cool T-shirts!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #94 - Frightfest 2009 part one
item.description: It's time for the first part of our annual Frightfest review - all the movies we took in on the first couple of days at the UK's biggest horror festival, including Triangle, The Hills Run Red, Infestation, The Horseman, Shadow and The Horde! Plus question of the week and a competition. With music from Marcus Stefanelli, one of our listeners!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #93 - Saturday Night's Alright For Writin': Part II
item.description: It's our long-awaited second book special, as we browse through another selection of movie-related publications and take a nostalgic look back at the fanzine days of the early '90s. Sorry about the dodgy sound again - back to normal next time!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #92 - Antichrist Super-Lars!
item.description: Lars Von Trier remains as controversial as ever with the psychological horror drama Antichrist, and Philip Ridley explores the dark side of childhood with his little-seen film The Reflecting Skin. Plus listener mail, a competition and question of the week!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #91 - We And Mr Jones
item.description: On a special one-off show, we talk to legendary horror critic and Frightfest co-director Alan Jones about this year's event, the challenges of putting on a festival and his career in general.

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #90 - Uncle Sam Wants You!
item.description: We return with a double-length show, featuring a review of Sam Raimi's Drag Me To Hell and a look at a trio of recent Hollywood horror remakes - F in on the first couple of days at the UK's biggest horror festival, including Triangle, The Hills Run Red, Infestation, The Horseman, Shadow and The Horde! Plus question of the week and a competition. With music from Marcus Stefanelli, one of our listeners!

item.title: Mondo Movie - Show #93 - Saturday Night's Alright For Writin': Part II
item.description: It's our long-awaited second book special, as we browse through another selection of movie-related publications and take a nostalgic look back at the fanzine days of the early '90s. Sorry about the dodgy sound again - back to normal next time!
